plot: A mesmeric play taking place inside the mind of Bernard Zeidan the mental Lebanese astronomer. Hypnosis makes Bernard visualize a whole play performed inside his mind.
title: A Play Entitled Sehnsucht
plot_es: A mesmeric play taking place inside the mind of Bernard Zeidan the mental Lebanese astronomer. Hypnosis makes Bernard visualize a whole play performed inside his mind.
plot_en: A mesmeric play taking place inside the mind of Bernard Zeidan the mental Lebanese astronomer. Hypnosis makes Bernard visualize a whole play performed inside his mind.
